item.title: Bookreview
item.description: Hello These are my book reviews Goodreads. Reading 📗From Lukov with Love - Mariana ZapataRating: 4 ⭐ A solid 3.75 stars<br/><br/>Its not like the book is bad, quite the opposite. Its a page turner and I finished it in 2 days. The rating is because the book is soo predictable. If this is your first Mariana Zapata book, you might even love it. This being my 3rd book of the author, I was a little disappointed,
